document.full_text: marius holtet's four strikes lifted norway to a crushing 5-2 win over france at the world championship on monday and secured them the last available slot for the quarter-finals which start on wednesday.
document.title: holtet's four goals put norway into quarter-finals
lines_and_colors: marius holtet's four strikes lifted norway to a crushing 5-2 win over france at the world championship on monday and secured them the last available slot for the quarter-finals which start on wednesday.
